name: Visitors to informal science institutions, by respondent characteristic: 2018
description: Visitors to informal science institutions, by respondent characteristic: 2018

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_informal_science_institution_zoo_or_aquarium
variableMeasured.description: Informal Science Institution Zoo Or Aquarium

variableMeasured.name: field_informal_science_institution_science_or_technology_museum
variableMeasured.description: Informal Science Institution Science Or Technology Museum

variableMeasured.name: field_informal_science_institution_any_informalscience_institutiona
variableMeasured.description: Informal Science Institution Any Informalscience Institutiona

notes: Responses are to the following: I am going to read you a short list of places and ask you to tell me how many times you visited each type of place during the last year, that is, the last 12 months. Percentages indicate individuals who visited an institution at least once. Percentages are based on the n in each row, including those who responded "don't know" or refused to respond.
sources: NORC at the University of Chicago, General Social Survey (2018).Science and Engineering Indicators
